product_name: Patagonia Better Sweater Fleece Vest - Women's
long_description: Combining the aesthetic of wool with the easy care of polyester fleece, the Patagonia Better Sweater vest helps you prepare for summer days that can quickly revert to spring days. Slim-fitting vest features feminine seaming and a sweater-knit exterior face that's dressy enough for brunch; plush fleece interior preserves core warmth. Front zipper has a garage and wind flap to fight chilly gusts. Contrast trim detail at wind flap, pockets, armholes and hem lends style. Better Sweater vest features zip handwarmer pockets and interior drop-in pockets. Close-fitting, slim fit.
short_description: Combining the aesthetic of wool with the easy care of polyester fleece, the Patagonia Better Sweater vest helps you prepare for summer days that can quickly revert to spring days.
